body.p: Born in Adams County, Pennsylvania. Enlisted in Company A. 1st Engineer Battalion, US Army on October 23, 1860. Transferred to the 95th New York Infantry Regiment September 26, 1863. Leas died on December 12, 1906 in Manhattan, New York.
